PackageOracle.name: DA_ACCOUNT_BILL_INFO
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_BILL_INFO
/* Generated on 17-JUL-15 11.26.05.434393000 PM -05:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,bill_day IN NUMBER
,bill_cycle IN NUMBER
,paperless_bill IN VARCHAR2
,electronic_bill_flag IN VARCHAR2
,ebpp_ind IN VARCHAR2
,bill_to_nm IN VARCHAR2
,stmt_hld_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,bill_day IN NUMBER
,bill_cycle IN NUMBER
,paperless_bill IN VARCHAR2
,electronic_bill_flag IN VARCHAR2
,ebpp_ind IN VARCHAR2
,bill_to_nm IN VARCHAR2
,stmt_hld_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,bill_day IN NUMBER
,bill_cycle IN NUMBER
,paperless_bill IN VARCHAR2
,electronic_bill_flag IN VARCHAR2
,ebpp_ind IN VARCHAR2
,bill_to_nm IN VARCHAR2
,stmt_hld_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_account_bill_info;

body.name: DA_ACCOUNT_BILL_INFO
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_BILL_INFO
/* Generated on 17-JUL-15 11.26.05.624369000 PM -05:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,bill_day IN NUMBER
,bill_cycle IN NUMBER
,paperless_bill IN VARCHAR2
,electronic_bill_flag IN VARCHAR2
,ebpp_ind IN VARCHAR2
,bill_to_nm IN VARCHAR2
,stmt_hld_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_bill_info.add(fx), parms=' || bill_day || '|' || bill_cycle || '|' || paperless_bill || '|' || electronic_bill_flag || '|' || ebpp_ind || '|' || bill_to_nm || '|' || stmt_hld_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_bill_info a
(
a.account_id
,a.bill_day
,a.bill_cycle
,a.paperless_bill
,a.electronic_bill_flag
,a.ebpp_ind
,a.bill_to_nm
,a.stmt_hld_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_account_id.NEXTVAL
,add.bill_day
,add.bill_cycle
,add.paperless_bill
,add.electronic_bill_flag
,add.ebpp_ind
,add.bill_to_nm
,add.stmt_hld_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.account_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_bill_info.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,bill_day IN NUMBER
,bill_cycle IN NUMBER
,paperless_bill IN VARCHAR2
,electronic_bill_flag IN VARCHAR2
,ebpp_ind IN VARCHAR2
,bill_to_nm IN VARCHAR2
,stmt_hld_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_bill_info.add, parms=' || bill_day || '|' || bill_cycle || '|' || paperless_bill || '|' || electronic_bill_flag || '|' || ebpp_ind || '|' || bill_to_nm || '|' || stmt_hld_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_bill_info a
(
a.account_id
,a.bill_day
,a.bill_cycle
,a.paperless_bill
,a.electronic_bill_flag
,a.ebpp_ind
,a.bill_to_nm
,a.stmt_hld_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_account_id.NEXTVAL
,add.bill_day
,add.bill_cycle
,add.paperless_bill
,add.electronic_bill_flag
,add.ebpp_ind
,add.bill_to_nm
,add.stmt_hld_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_bill_info.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,bill_day IN NUMBER
,bill_cycle IN NUMBER
,paperless_bill IN VARCHAR2
,electronic_bill_flag IN VARCHAR2
,ebpp_ind IN VARCHAR2
,bill_to_nm IN VARCHAR2
,stmt_hld_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_bill_info.add, parms=' || account_id || '|' || bill_day || '|' || bill_cycle || '|' || paperless_bill || '|' || electronic_bill_flag || '|' || ebpp_ind || '|' || bill_to_nm || '|' || stmt_hld_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_bill_info a
(
a.account_id
,a.bill_day
,a.bill_cycle
,a.paperless_bill
,a.electronic_bill_flag
,a.ebpp_ind
,a.bill_to_nm
,a.stmt_hld_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.account_id
,add.bill_day
,add.bill_cycle
,add.paperless_bill
,add.electronic_bill_flag
,add.ebpp_ind
,add.bill_to_nm
,add.stmt_hld_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_bill_info.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_bill_info.del, parms=' || account_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_account_bill_info a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.account_id = del.account_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_bill_info.del');

END del;

END da_account_bill_info;
